-- This is a comment in ELM programming language
import Html exposing (Html, div, text)

-- Declare a variable and assign it a value
myList : List String
myList =
    [ "apple", "banana", "orange" ]

-- Define a function that takes in a string and returns an HTML element
myFunction : String -> Html
myFunction str =
    div []
        [ text str ]

-- Create a list of HTML elements using list comprehension
-- Each element in the list will be an HTML element generated by calling myFunction
myHtmlList : List Html
myHtmlList =
    [ myFunction fruit | fruit <- myList ]

-- Display the list of HTML elements in the browser
main : Html msg
main =
    div []
        [ text "My List:" -- Display a text in the browser
        , div [class "list"] myHtmlList -- Display the list of HTML elements
        ]
